quoteFirst: “No one could have behaved more perfectly than this man, who once behaved so ill,” said she to the marchesa. “To-night, at the Scala, when the theatre clock strikes
quoteLast: , we will turn everybody out of our box, we will shut our door, and at eleven o’clock the canon will come himself, and tell us what he has been able to do. This plan seemed to us the one least likely to compromise him.

quoteFirst: After a while it occurred to him to switch on the electric light that illuminated the dial of a small clock.  It was
quoteLast: .  He must have been flying for nearly half an hour, but neither to right or left nor straight ahead was there any sign of the expected lights of Aix.
